text: Thomas Vinciguerra (October 8, 1963 â€“ February 22, 2021) was an American journalist, editor, and author. He was a founding editor of The Week magazine. He published about popular culture in the New York Times, as well as in The Wall Street Journal, The New Yorker and GQ. Vinciguerra died on February 22, 2021 in Garden City, New York at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American editors Category:Journalists from New York City
title: Thomas Vinciguerra
